name: Microsoft Graphics Component权限提升漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Windows Server 2022", "Microsoft Window 11 22H2", "Microsoft Window 11 23H2", "Microsoft Window 11 24H2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2025", "Microsoft Window 11 25H2", "Microsoft Window 11 22H3"]
description: Microsoft Graphics Component是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的图形驱动组件。Microsoft Graphics Component存在安全漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞提升权限。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-59261
patch: Microsoft Graphics Component权限提升漏洞的补丁
